replies.msg:
The campaign was started by French politician Raphaël Glucksmann, who entered the European Parliament last year with the goal of being “the voice of the voiceless people.” He encouraged people to post a sky-blue square (“in Uyghur colors”) on their social media platforms on October 1, China’s National Day.

Several big-name French soccer players answered the call. Current Fiorentina winger and Bayern Munich icon Franck Ribéry, Napoli star Kalidou Koulibaly[/b], and Barcelona wunderkind [b]Ousmane Dembele were among those who posted in solidarity with the campaign.

《借位share》
https://youtu.be/EowFl7feNjs
呢個Page係一班喺加拿大嘅香港人，
希望透過呢page向世界揭示共產黨嘅所作所為，將文宣打入國際
個Page喺加拿大搵左啲受共產黨脅迫嘅人士進行訪問，
拍成紀錄片，做中英對照，
希望透過受害人第一身嘅分享嚟喚醒世界對共產黨嘅警覺

對付共產黨係長期嘅抗爭，
唔只係香港人嘅事，亦係全世界嘅事，
希望大家可以幫手分享一下呢個page
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/humanrightsmanifesto
Twitter: @ManifestoRights
Instagram: @human_rights_manifesto

replies.msg: 巴=最黃球會

球會隊友阿根廷球王美斯，亦是華為的代言人之一，未知會否跟隨基沙文作出相關決定。基沙文不是首位為維吾爾族人發聲的球星，效力阿仙奴的德國籍球星奧斯爾，因曾經批評中國打壓新疆維吾爾人後，上季尾及今季一直被阿仙奴雪藏，未有上陣機會。

美欺
